name: sand-rush
caption: Sand Rush

effect.short: Doubles [Speed]{mechanic:speed} during a [sandstorm]{mechanic:sandstorm}.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
effect.full: This Pokémon's [Speed]{mechanic:speed} is doubled during a [sandstorm]{mechanic:sandstorm}, and it does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.

flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a sandstorm.
